summary: This Mod Gives Galmar Stone-Fist A Make-Over.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]Galmar The Great[/size][/b]

This Mod Gives Galmar Stone-Fist A Make-Over.
He Now Has His Own War Paint, Better Outfit And A Better Weapon.
His Outfit Is A Combination Of The Stormcloak Boots And Gauntlets, But I Made New Ones That Are Heavy Armor.
The Armor Itself Is Dragonscale Armor But I Made A New Version Called Stormcloak Dragonscale Armor And Is Also Heavy.
His Weapon Is A Nord Hero Great Sword Instead Of That Lame Old Iron Axe He Had On His Back.
Everything Is Lootable If You Have High Pickpocket Skills Or Have Killed Him When Sided With The Imperials In The Civil War Quest.

Instalation: Place In Skyrim Data Folder.
author: JP0005
